```{r, include=FALSE}
a1 <- a[{{i}},]
val <- c(apply(a1,1,\(x) x))
ind <- which(!is.na(val))
eval <- length(ind)>0
```

```{r, results='asis', eval=eval}
fio <- paste(a1[[3]],a1[[4]],a1[[5]])
lab <- digest::digest(fio,"crc32")
cat("###",fio,paste0("{#cadet",lab,"}"))
```

```{r, eval=eval}
val <- gsub("(\\r)*\\n","<br>",val)
da <- data.frame(prm=colnames(a),value=val,check.names=FALSE)[ind,]
rownames(da) <- seq(nrow(da))
knitr::kable(da,row.names=TRUE)
```
